about_the_game:
*Identical DLC is available for all games in the Fuga: Melodies of Steel series. Please be careful not to buy duplicates.

Volume 3 of the comicalized Fuga: Melodies of Steel!

Story:
The story treads a path beyond what the game followed.
The children are left shaken after seeing the horrors inside the Berman laboratory. Wappa joins the crew, and Sheena finally reunites with her family, bringing some much-needed happiness. But their biggest challenge lies ahead—Malt and his friends must now face their ultimate enemy, Supreme Commander Hax! To their shock, the Tarascus he pilots is the spitting image of the Taranis. It seems there are mysteries still abound...

Artist:
Original Story: CyberConnect2
Manga: Takafumi Adachi
His representative works are D・MFighter Honoo, Metal Fight Beyblade, Ballet Hero Fantasy: Dan no bouken, and Anima Gear.

Specs: .pdf file, B6, Monochrome, 103 Pages
